articles.description: Smell the cologne-scented ashes of shopping bags plastered with photos of nearly naked white men when “White Hot: The Rise and Fall of Abercrombie & Fitch” starts streaming.
articles.content: You know that youre getting close when youre hit with the smell of Abercrombie, begins the trailer for Netflixs upcoming documentary about the scandal-soaked clothing brand, Abercrombie & Fitch. … [+2962 chars]

articles.title: Ben Schwartz from Sonic the Hedgehog 2 does the second-fastest interview ever - Polygon
articles.description: Actor Ben Schwartz, star of Sonic the Hedgehog, made us a promise: if Sonic 2 got greenlit, he would return to our studio and do another speed-interview with...

articles.author: Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Elliot Page's 'Umbrella Academy' character to come out as transgender - CNN
articles.description: Elliott Page's character on "Umbrella Academy" will mimic real life.

articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Obi-Wan Kenobi's premiere will be two days late, but you'll get two episodes at once - The Verge
articles.description: The Obi-Wan Kenobi Disney Plus series will now debut on Friday, May 27th, two days later than previously announced. There will be two episodes of the Star Wars spinoff available to watch on the premiere date instead of just one.
articles.content:
The show now debuts on May 27th
